channel.title: Comments on: Too Much of a Good Thing
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description:
Evenings at home are lovely, but it's nice to dive into a new city. This way you are reassured that it was a good move.
I'm glad you blogged, however. I always love to live vicariously...
item.content:encoded:
Evenings at home are lovely, but it’s nice to dive into a new city. This way you are reassured that it was a good move.

I’m glad you blogged, however. I always love to live vicariously…
